subproject.description:
The key objective of the Strategic Outreach Monitoring and Evaluation  is establishing a functional monitoring and evaluation system for UNDP Sudan under the corporate Result Based Management (RBM) framework. The main focus areas of the projects are:

Establishment / Strengthening  the Country Programme  M&E systems

Support the CO learning, knowledge management,  and evaluation capacity development by managing   systems, tools and products to support evidence based programming.
subproject.title: Strategic Outreach Monitoring

title: Strategic Outreach, Monitoring and Evaluation Project
